column1:
Watch this animation (http://openstaxcollege.org/l/bloodflow1) to see how blood flows to the brain and passes
through the circle of Willis before being distributed through the cerebrum. The circle of Willis is a specialized
arrangementofarteriesthatensureconstantperfusionofthecerebrumevenintheeventofablockageofoneofthe
arteries in the circle. The animation shows the normal direction of flow through the circle of Willis to the middle
cerebralartery.Wherewouldthebloodcomefromiftherewereablockagejustposteriortothemiddlecerebralartery
on the left?
